mutants.original_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x + flatten(y), matrix, [])
mutants.mutated_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x - flatten(y), matrix, [])

mutants.original_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x + flatten(y), matrix, [])
mutants.mutated_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x * flatten(y), matrix, [])
